0.text: Innate: Upon taking  fatal damage, Karthus  remains active for 7 seconds, rendering himself unable to move, basic attack, use summoner spells, or activate items, but becoming  untargetable and  immune to crowd control and preventing all incoming damage for the duration as well as being able to cast abilities at no cost.

1.text: If  Defile has been learned, it will remain toggled on for Death Defied's entire duration.  Requiem becomes disabled after Death Defied has lasted 4 seconds.

0.text: Active: Karthus creates a blast at the target location which detonates after 0.528 seconds to 0.759 seconds, granting  sight of the area before dealing magic damage to all enemies within,  doubled when hitting only one target.

1.text: Lay Waste's damage is reduced by 15% against  monsters.

2.text: During  Death Defied, Lay Waste will cast at maximum range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Active: Karthus summons a passable wall of spectral energy at the target location perpendicular to his facing for 5 seconds, granting  sight around its pillars and center.

1.text: Enemies that pass through the wall for the first time from the same cast are  slowed for 4 seconds, decaying over the duration, and have their  magic resistance reduced by 15% for the same duration.

0.text: Passive: Karthus restores  mana whenever he kills an enemy.

1.text: Toggle: Karthus surrounds himself with a necrotic aura, dealing magic damage every 0.25 seconds to all nearby enemies. Toggling Defile off triggers a tick of damage.

2.text: Defile cannot be toggled off during  Death Defied, but it can be while channeling  Requiem.

0.text: Active: Karthus  channels for 3 seconds then deals magic damage to all targetable enemy  champions upon its completion.

1.concerningText: Active: Karthus creates a blast at the target location which detonates after 0.528 seconds to 0.759 seconds, granting  sight of the area before dealing magic damage to all enemies within,  doubled when hitting only one target.

2.concerningText: Active: Karthus summons a passable wall of spectral energy at the target location perpendicular to his facing for 5 seconds, granting  sight around its pillars and center.

4.concerningText: Active: Karthus  channels for 3 seconds then deals magic damage to all targetable enemy  champions upon its completion.

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which reveals the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which reveals the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

tags.originHTML:
Keywords

  • yellow
  • totem
  • trinket

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+8% omnivamp against monsters

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Sear: Damaging monsters burns them for 60 (+ 30% AP) (+ 5% bonus AD) (+ 2% bonus health) magic damage over 5 seconds. Omnivamp against monsters provided by this item is not reduced by area of effect damage.
Unique – Chilling Path: Using Smite 5 times consumes this item to upgrade your Smite into Chilling Smite, doubling its damage, and grants all item effects permanently after a 2.5-second delay.
Unique – Huntsman: Killing large monsters grants 60 bonus experience. The first large monster killed grants an additional 150 bonus experience, for a total of 210. If you are at least 2 levels below the average level of the game, large monster kills grant 50 bonus experience per level below the average level of all players in the game. If your gold from minions is greater than 40% your gold from monsters, a lane minion will grant 13 less gold and 50% reduced experience. This penalty is removed at 20 minutes.
Unique – Recoup: Regenerate up to 8 − 18 (based on level) mana per second when in the jungle or river, based on missing mana.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SEAR: Damaging monsters burns them for 60 (+ 30% AP) (+ 5% bonus AD) (+ 2% bonus health) magic damage over 5 seconds. Omnivamp against monsters provided by this item is not reduced by area of effect damage.

tags.originHTML:
Keywords

  • jungle

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique: Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (2 charges).
passive.originText: UNIQUE: Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (2 charges).

consume.originHTML:
Consume

Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.21 health every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, restoring a total of 125 health.
consume.originText: Consumes a charge to regenerate 5.21 health every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, restoring a total of 125 health.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Torment: Dealing ability damage burns enemies, causing them to take「 60 (+ 6% AP) (+ 4% target's maximum health) total magic damage over 4 seconds. 」「 15 (+ 1.5% AP) (+ 1% target's maximum health) magic damage every second for 4 seconds. 」
Unique – Agony: Deal 0% − 12% (based on target's bonus health) bonus magic damage against enemy champions.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 ability haste.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – TORMENT: Dealing ability damage burns enemies, causing them to take「 60 (+ 6% AP) (+ 4% target's maximum health) total magic damage over 4 seconds. 」
